Class RedirectUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.transport.http.netty.sender.RedirectUtil

  • public class RedirectUtil
extends Object
    RedirectUtil contains utility methods used to HTTP client side redirection.

      • createRedirectCarbonRequest

        public static HTTPCarbonMessage createRedirectCarbonRequest(String redirectionUrl,
                                                            String redirectionMethod,
                                                            int statusCode,
                                                            io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                                                            List<Map.Entry<String,String>> headers)
                                                     throws MalformedURLException
        Creates redirect request message.
        Parameters:
        redirectionUrl - to which the request is sent
        redirectionMethod - of the redirect request
        statusCode - of the request
        ctx - of the request
        headers - of the request
        Returns:
        HTTPCarbonMessage with request properties
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - when the url is incorrect

      • getResolvedRedirectURI

        public static String getResolvedRedirectURI(String locationHeaderVal,
                                            HTTPCarbonMessage originalRequest)
                                     throws URISyntaxException,
                                            UnsupportedEncodingException
        Builds redirect url from the location header value.
        Parameters:
        locationHeaderVal - value of the location header
        originalRequest - original HTTPCarbon request
        Returns:
        resolved redirect url
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - if uri syntax is not correct
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if uri decoding fails
